original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi sammati

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi sammati

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca
